author: perezhilton
title: David Arquette Pays Tribute To Late Sister Alexis By Naming His Newborn Augustus Alexis Arquette — See The First Pic!
text:
Exciting news!
David Arquette is now a proud father of three as his wife, Christina gave birth to a baby boy on Wednesday (March 8)! Awwww.
It's said the twosome have named their latest little one, Augustus Alexis Arquette . As we're sure you've noticed, the youngster's middle name is in honor of the Scream actor's late sister, Alexis Arquette , who passed away in September. However, the happy parents are planning on calling their baby boy Gus.
Related: Hoda Kotb Is LOVING Motherhood
And David is clearly smitten with his newborn as he took to Instagram and posted:
